name: MiniGolf (itch) (Hacker008)
description:
This a small minigolf game I made, it has a local multiplayer mode. I can't take all the credit though, for the core of the game I followed a youtube tutorial(link below), and downloaded the assets.  I will make more levels in the near future.

Controlls: A and D to aim, hold down space to charge up, then release space to putt.
